summary:
* His name is Ekk

* He is an archer.

* He is skilled in Sneak, Light armor, and Archery.

* He can heel you and himself in combat.
descriptionHtml:
Ekk is an archer from Valenwood who came to Skyrim looking for riches and adventure when he heard about the return of the Dragonborn. When he could not find work he wound up in Riverwood staying at the Sleeping Giant Inn. You can find him and pick him up there. He will follow you and plays nice with other followers.

Stats:
[list] [*]Archery:50
[*]One handed:25
[*]Light Armor:50
[*]Sneak:40 [/list]
author: Thersgame
